titleStmt.title: Metamorphosis Anglorum or reflections historical and political, upon the late changes of government in England, from the death of Oliver Lord Protector, to the last dissolution of the Parliament. As it was represented by a person of quality, to the most excellent Don Lewis de Haro, Chief Minister of State to his Majesty of Spain.
titleStmt.author: Méndez de Haro, Luis, 1598-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Palmer at the Palm tree neer St. Dunstans Church in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Palm tree neer St. Dunstans Church in Fleet-street
